translation.ride_cancelled_text: Your ride has been cancelled. If you have any concerns or need assistance, feel free to reach out to us. Safe travels and thank you for using Seaats.
translation.cta_add_car: Let's get you on the road!
translation.wait_processing2: We'll get back to you within 24 hours
translation.code_sent: Please verify your phone number by clicking the button below!
translation.seconds_before_requesting: seconds before requesting a new code
translation.withdraw_disclaimer: Withdrawals may take up to 48 hours to be processed.
translation.privacy_question: Question to be asked in join requests
translation.privacy_question_example: Example: What is your university ID number?
translation.community_request_sent: Your request to join this community has been sent, and you'll be getting a reply soon!
translation.welcome_message: Hello there, sign in to continue!
translation.account_needed: Hello there, you'll need to create an account to continue!
translation.apply_vehicle_owner: You haven't applied to be a vehicle owner yet, apply now!
translation.cta_no_rides: Your next ride is just a tap away. Book or post a ride now!
translation.submit_license: Submit your license and become a vehicle owner to start making money on your commute!
translation.cancel_disclaimer: You can cancel for free up until %%, after that you will be charged the full price of the ride.
translation.cancel_confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel?
translation.ratings_text: Please take a moment to rate the passengers you've taken this ride with. This helps us keep up the integrity of our market!
translation.arrive_at_dest: button when you have arrived at the destination. After that, please check the passengers out.
translation.passenger_in_car: button when the passenger has gotten in the car. If a passenger fails to show up within the allocated waiting period, please press the
translation.receive_payments: button when you receive payments from everyone paying in cash
translation.share_your_code2: Invite an unlimited amount of friends with your referral code and reap the benefits together!
translation.earn_vouchers2: Get a voucher worth 50 EGP for you and your loved ones for every referral
translation.repeat: Repeat as many times as you want
translation.repeat2: There is no limit to how many people you can invite, share your code and watch your rewards stack up!
translation.disclaimer_car: In order to post a ride, you must have a car registered with us, click the button below to add a car now!
translation.pickup_question: Do you want to be picked up?
translation.cs_chat_message: Hi, %% ðŸ‘‹! Thank you for contacing seaats customer service. Please type in your inquiry and a customer service agent will be assigned to you shortly! ðŸ˜„
translation.by_continuing: By continuing, you agree to seaats's
translation.no_rides_posted: Sorry, no rides found for this route. Consider offering a ride to help others.
translation.no_car: In order to post a ride, you must have a car registered with us, click the button below to add a car now!
translation.allow_pickup: Allow pick up requests from nearby passengers?
translation.pickup_range: Pick ups will be enabled for passengers within 5 kilometers from your starting point, please price accordingly.
translation.referral_description: We have added 50 EGP to your wallet redeemable on any future ride!
translation.error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
translation.error_invalid_phone: Please enter a valid phone number
translation.error_bank_long: Bank name is too long, feel free to abbreviate
translation.error_invalid_expiry: Invalid expiry date. Enter in the form MM/YY
translation.error_invalid_password: Your password must be at least 8 characters, contain at least one special character, one number, one lowercase letter, and one uppercase letter
translation.error_pickup_price: Price should be at least 20 EGP
translation.error_phone_in_use: Phone number is already in use
translation.error_datetime: Date and time must be in the future
translation.sure_delete: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
translation.deletion_confirmation: Your account will now be marked for deletion. This means that your data will be completely wiped off the system in 14 days. If you change your mind during this time, simply log back in and we will cancel the deletion process.
translation.see_uni_list: See list of universities we're currently working with
translation.driver_popup_text: Start saving money with Seaats today. All you have to do is sign up as a car owner, and save money on your daily commute. It will only take you a few seconds!
translation.driver_popup_d1: You will probably need this someday.
translation.notification_onehour: Get ready, your trip to %% leaves in one hour!
translation.notification_sixhours: Get ready, your trip to %% leaves in six hours!
translation.notification_twodays: Your trip to %% leaves in less than two days!
